## The microPower power supply

TBA description

### Features:

The microPower features:

* 1
* 2
* 3

## Revisions & Issues

### rev 0.1

Rev 0.1 is the first published revision. This revision is missing the following items:
* Power on/off switch
* Power LED
* TBA

## Files

* Altium project files (including required libraries for the headers)
* Gerber and NC Drill files
* Schematic [PDF](https://github.com/dermitza/microPower/blob/master/altium/microPower/microPower1.pdf)
